ai-patthana23.17:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana23.17:0.3_0: he deposited himself with the previous ones.
ai-patthana23.17:1.1_0: skilled in the present, skilled in what is not for the teaching, what is a reason for this.
ai-patthana23.17:2.1_0: In regard to the eighteen topics, the eighteen bases for knowing the important principles, there are no sixteen accessories.
ai-patthana23.17:3.1_0: Nor do they arise because of the past.
ai-patthana23.17:4.1_0: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful.
ai-patthana23.17:5.1_0: Nor do they arise because of the unskillful.
